subject: source code for TestRunner
msgSnippet: Does anyone know where I could find the source code for TestRunner, I can only find the class files.  I am trying to work out how to use reflection to extract
messageBody:
Does anyone know where I could find the source code for TestRunner, I can
only find the class files. I am trying to work out how to use reflection to
extract the methods from the class, before passing them to the run method.
I guess this is already built into the framework.

Peter Cullinan.
